senses.sense_definition: A type of fine-grained volcanic rock that makes a ringing or clinking sound when struck; also known as <w>phonolite</w>.

examples.text: The geologist identified the specimen as <w>clinkstone</w> after tapping it with a hammer to hear the metallic ring.
Because of its durability and unique acoustic properties, the <w>clinkstone</w> was occasionally used in local construction.
